info.title: Twilio - Accounts
info.description: This is the public Twilio REST API.

post.description: Promote the secondary Auth Token to primary. After promoting the new token, all requests to Twilio using your old primary Auth Token will result in an error.

get.description: Retrieves a collection of AWS Credentials belonging to the account used to make the request

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: How many resources to return in each list page. The default is 50, and the maximum is 1000.

parameters.description: The page index. This value is simply for client state.

parameters.name: PageToken
parameters.description: The page token. This is provided by the API.

Credentials.description: A string that contains the AWS access credentials in the format `<AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID>:<AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY>`. For example, `AKIAIOSFODNN7EXAMPLE:wJalrXUtnFEMI/K7MDENG/bPxRfiCYEXAMPLEKEY`

FriendlyName.description: A descriptive string that you create to describe the resource. It can be up to 64 characters long.

AccountSid.description: The SID of the Subaccount that this Credential should be associated with. Must be a valid Subaccount of the account issuing the request.
